name: Remnants (itch) (JedKlika)
description:
It's the height of world war 2 and you were on your to battle the axis forces in the Pacific Ocean. At last before you saw any combat the ship that was carrying you has  crashed  on mysterious island where things aren't quite right. You soon discover that you are the sole survivor of your ship. From here your goal is simple, try to adapt to your surrounding find the materials necessary to keep yourself alive and eventually seek out recuse.

Production Team

Jed Klika- Lead Programmer, Project Lead, Co designer

Pascal Wilson Lead Artist ,  Co designer

Steffen Abrhams- Character Artists/ animator
